title: Arctic Mint Nicotine Pouches by Extreme
description: TRY ARCTIC MINT NICOTINE POUCHES Arctic Mint Nicotine Pouches by Extreme have a velvety soft bag with the delicious taste of ice-cold mint and a pleasant aftertaste. View all Extreme Pouches View all Mint/Menthol Pouches View all Extra Strong Pouches KEY FEATURES: Mint & Menthol flavoured nicotine pouches Recommended for experienced users 16MG Per Gram | 12.8MG Per Pouch Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 20 pouches in each can MORE ABOUT MINT FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES The alluring and cooling flavour of the fresh mint provides an unbeatable, refreshing nicotine experience and invigorating taste, helping you leave cigarettes behind for good. MORE ABOUT NICOTINE POUCHES Discreet, slim pouches containing tobacco-free nicotine are packed into these stylish cans that fit perfectly in your pocket. Simply pop the pouch under your lip and you're ready to go. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: Extreme Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Large Our Strength Rating: Strong Nicotine Per Pouch (mg/pouch) 16 MG Flavour Name: Arctic Mint Flavour: Mint & Menthol Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
